parameters.name: DomainExtensionId
parameters.description: The ID of the additional certificate.

parameters.name: ListenerPort
parameters.description: The frontend port of the HTTPS listener that is configured for the Classic Load Balancer (CLB) instance. Valid values: **1 to 65535**.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerId
parameters.description: The ID of the CLB instance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the CLB instance is deployed.
